651: And the referee recorded it, of course. The whole issue of handling the ball on Zadze’s part is no longer relevant.
652: What options do the coaches have? Sari, who I think is happy with the first half. His team wins 1-0. Sari certainly has reserves. Goes into the ball. Addresses to the right. Possibly dangerous.
653: Napole does not have the ball. The Napolitans already control the center of the field. There is Ivan Strinic in the reserve. Left back. I think this is not very relevant. There is Kirikis. Central defender. There is Christian Maggio. There is Mirko Maltifiori. From the attacking group, of course, Gabiedini. Of course El Kadoori. But Napoleon has already made one substitution. Dries Mertens instead of Insigne. Well, because of Lorenzo's injury. He left the field.
654: Juventus is much more interesting. Quadrado is in reserve here. Murata is in reserve here. These are two obvious candidates for entering the field. And I think, I admit that perhaps Juve will change the formation.
